sentence.Network_en: Habitat and ecology: In montane forest. Flowering: June.

sentence.Network_en: They are commonly adapted to either woodland habitats, often montane, or sometimes to grassland habitats.

sentence.Network_en: On these soils, pine dominates and makes up the coniferous border with the montane birch forest.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这些土壤, 杉木控制并且组成与山桦树森林的具球果边界.
